objects.text:
• Advanced 16.3MP APS-C Sensor
• Real-time Film Simulation Modes
• Compact Design for Travel
Limited time offer. Free premium lens kit included.

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Premium Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled design with modern functionality
• Advanced 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Fast and accurate autofocus system with 77 AF points
• Tiltable 3.0-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for instant photo sharing
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for professional-grade operation
• Real-time film simulation modes for creative expression
• Weather-sealed construction for durability

banner_details:
This banner showcases a high-end mirrorless camera using a sleek and modern dark-themed design. The layout is vertically divided, with the left half presenting key textual information and the right half featuring a high-resolution product image of the camera tilted dynamically. The background employs diagonal lines and semi-transparent vector elements like circles and strokes to add depth and sophistication without distracting from the content. Text layers include a bold title (`heading`), a subtitle (`subheading`), a three-point feature list (`description`), prominently styled pricing detail (`price`), a call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`), and a fine-print note at the bottom (`tagline`). The high-contrast text ensures readability over the dark background.

Color Palette:
- Jet Black: `#000000`
- Charcoal Black: `#111111`
- Light Gray: `#f5f5f5`
- Soft White (semi-transparent): `#ffffffb3`
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera predominantly in sleek matte and glossy blacks, giving it a sophisticated and high-end look. The primary color is deep black (#1C1C1C), which makes up most of the body. Accents of white (#FFFFFF) are used for text and markings that stand out cleanly against the dark surface. Subtle metallic grays (#4B4B4B) enhance the buttons and dials, while a touch of red (#FF3B30) and orange (#FFA500) in the lens markings adds visual interest. The lens coating reflects pale green and yellow hues (#BADB73, #F8E76A), subtly blending into the overall professional tone of the camera.
